document_data.mainbody:
Tatchalik was a bounty hunter from Chult, active before 1372 DR.
Intulik of the Blood used his magics and political prowess to gain power sometime before 1372 DR, assassinating his political opposition. Eventually, he rose to power over non-Mezroan Chultan tribes. However, the subjection was short-lived. Intuliks career was ended via the sword of a bounty hunter called Tatchalik. He claimed the Spirit of the Predator, the enchanted helmet created by Intulik, as his payment and left Chult for Waterdeep, proudly displaying the new magical trophy.
